title: Thursday Pt1: Do Steelers or Browns need win more? Rodgers & Brady rivalry; Panic time for Cincinnati?
itunes:title: Thursday Pt1: Do Steelers or Browns need win more? Rodgers & Brady rivalry; Panic time for Cincinnati?
description:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O’Hara speaking with Jason McCourty live from Cleveland and everyone shares if the Pittsburgh Steelers or Cleveland Browns need a bounce back win more on Thursday Night Football. Next, they look at what a win over Tom Brady would mean for Aaron Rodgers and then they answer if it’s time for the Cincinnati Bengals to panic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O’Hara speaking with Jason McCourty live from Cleveland and everyone shares if the Pittsburgh Steelers or Cleveland Browns need a bounce back win more on Thursday Night Football. Next, they look at what a win over Tom Brady would mean for Aaron Rodgers and then they answer if it’s time for the Cincinnati Bengals to panic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
